item.title: How to make a URL shortner
item.description: What is a URL shortner ? It is a service that takes in a larger URL and turns it into a smaller URL, for the sake of: Convencice Tracking clicks Tracking where the URL was opened from. For Example: Long URL: https://www.amazon.in/gp/bestsellers/?ref_=nav_em_cs_bestsellers_0_1_1_2 Short URL: http://MyWebSite.com/{key} We replaced the larger url with a unique key in out system from which we can identify our unique key. How to generate a key ?
